sentences.en: A substantial reward is being offered for the recovery of a painting by Turner.
sentences.cn: 为追回特纳的一幅画，已发布了重金悬赏令。

sentences.en: Already in financial difficulties, Turner offloaded the painting on to the Getty Museum.
sentences.cn: 特纳已经陷入财政困难，于是将这幅画卖给了盖蒂美术馆。
地区警察局长布赖恩∙特纳

sentences.en: Down in Atlanta, Ted Turner was fighting his battles with the networks.
sentences.cn: 在亚特兰大, 特德特纳打他的战斗与网络.

sentences.en: He launched an immoderate tirade on Turner.
sentences.cn: 他针对特纳发表了一篇极端激愤的长篇演说。

sentences.en: How much will Mr. Turner pay for the tickets?
sentences.cn: 特纳先生的机票花了多少钱?

sentences.en: I got your message. Results on the sample from Rachel Turner's apartment?
sentences.cn: 接着你留言了瑞秋特纳公寓里样本的结果?

sentences.en: I, Jonathan Turner, give every cent I have to my three children.
sentences.cn: 我——乔纳森·特纳，将我所有的财产留给我的孩子们。

sentences.en: Miss Turner turned blazing eyes on the victim.
sentences.cn: 特纳小姐无比同情地看着受害者。

sentences.en: The book is a page - turner.
sentences.cn: 这本书引人入胜,叫人爱不释手.

sentences.en: The picture on my wall is a copy of a painting by Turner.
sentences.cn: 我墙上的那张画是特纳油画的复制品.

sentences.en: Tina Turner shimmied across the stage in an incredibly sexy dress.
sentences.cn: 蒂娜·特纳穿着极其性感的裙子一边跳着希米舞一边穿过舞台。

sentences.en: Turner inherited the right to fish at this spot from his father.
sentences.cn: 特纳从父亲那里继承了在这个地点捕鱼的权利。

sentences.en: Turner is a writer and critic.
Turner was now necessarily an object of passionate, protective pity.
sentences.cn: 现在对特纳必须寄予热烈的爱护和怜悯.

sentences.en: Turner, however, putted superbly, twice holing from 40 feet.
sentences.cn: 然而特纳两次从40英尺处漂亮地将球轻击入洞。

words.tran_cn: 车工工艺；车削产品；车床工厂
